doc.title: Centerfold Fantasies
doc.plot: Escape on an erotic journey through a palatial Beverly Hills estate and climb aboard a yacht for a harbor cruise with your stunningly beautiful hostess Petra Verkaik (Playboy's Newsstand Special Readers' Choice 1997 Model of the Year, Playmate) and her voluptuous friends, Carrie Westcott, Tawnni Cable (Playboy Playmates), and Lisa Comshaw (Playboy Model). Join these beauties as they reveal their inner-most sensual fantasies and desires.
